alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 3:52AM MST until February 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, a snow band or two will be possible, and these bands may drop a quick inch or two of snow as they move across the region. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...The I-25 corridor region. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 AM MST early this morning. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
